alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 2:31AM EST until March 12 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Inland St. Johns, Inland Flagler, Eastern Clay, Eastern Putnam and South Central Duval Counties. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
